purpose: To provide a curated list of directories where AI tools can be submitted for increased visibility
principle: Aggregates and categorizes AI directories, making it easier for developers to find submission platforms
reusability: Can be used by AI tool developers to identify and submit their tools to relevant directories
limitations: The list is subject to change and may require regular updates to remain current
name: ai-directories
description: An awesome list of best top AI directories to submit your ai tools
highlight: Comprehensive list of AI directories for tool submission and discovery
